description: A customizable collapse component used for showing and hiding content. The component supports a 'header' and 'content' `<slot>` for injecting custom HTML. Do not set

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the component should have a border.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the outer div.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Controls whether the collapse is expanded or not.

properties.name: collapseId
properties.description: A unique identifier used to set the id attributes of various elements.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Configuration options for rendering the pre-laid out collapse component. Do not set this prop if you intend to use the 'header' slot.

events.name: expandedChange
events.description: Event emitted when the expanded prop is internally changed.
